-= Bedroom =-
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just fallen into a bedroom.

You can see a closed chest drawer. You see a closed antique trunk nearby. You can make out a king-size bed. The king-size bed is typical. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.

There is a closed wooden door leading east.

Okay, so you're in a kitchen, cool, but is it standard? You better believe it is.

You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a refrigerator. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a counter. You shudder, but continue examining the counter. The counter is typical. However, the counter, like an empty counter, has nothing on it. You make out a stove. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You can make out a kitchen island. The kitchen island is typical. On the kitchen island you see a note.

There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south.
